coded_answer.p: I can only travel onin July because thesethis is the mounthmonth when I have holidays. I've already talked to my manager, and she said that that's the only mounthmonth I can have my holidays.

I would prefer to stay in a log cabin because it must be cold to staystaying in a tent. I have some problems with my kidneys, so I can't stay in onone of the tents, and it alsoalso it must be very comfortable to staystaying in a log cabin.

I'm really good at Golf and Tennis, so I would like to choose these two activities. I've been doing these activities for a very long time. I've been playing Golf for five years, and I'mI've a handidate cuphandicap of sixteen, but the problem is that I haven't been playing Golf for a long time because I work every day. I've been playing tannistennis since I was seven, and I've been studying how to play tannistennis for a very long time, nine years.

I would like to know what kind of clothsclothes do I need to take with me, and can you write to me back about what kind of weather it's going to be there, for the time I will be staying there. Also I would like to know how much money should II should take with me, because I'm not sure how much I'll need to spend there. See you, Mrs Helen Ryan, and please write me back,.

I wish you werehad been there with me helping at a pop concert. I just loved it,. I was working with thesethis music system. You know how good I'mI am at music, anywayAnyway I was helping toat thesethis pop concert to get the corectcorrect sounds, at. At the biggingbeginning I was conectingconnecting all these wires into spekersspeakers, music system, guitarguitars etc... The particularly bit that Ibit that I particularly liked about the experience was when I was standing next to the singers and playing a guitar, - you know how much I love playing guitar, - and all these video cameras were just filming us. I asked onone of the camera mancameramancameramen when they're going to show thesethis show on tv, and he told me they're going to show it on the 10 of June, so turn on your tv on thesethis date, chanelchannel three, and you mustwill seemsee me there playing with thesethis guitar. AH, it was lovely. These singers are going to come next year so I want to invite you to my house for one or two weeks to see thesethis pop concert, beleavebelieve. Believe me, you'll love it and you might useplay the drums,. I told them that you're really good aton drums so they want to try you too.
I'll write to you soon Kim.
